Articles.Content:
Hello community.

I started playing 2 months ago. I became completely adicted to the game. Just love the game. However after the latest update 1.0.5 I am unable to do anything. Before I could orbit, go to Mun and Minus, create orbit stations and bases, etc, etc. Now I can hardly put a vessel in the atmosphere. All ships became uncontrolable. Is anyone having the same problem? It has been quite frustating for me
When you say "all ships became uncontrollable", what do you mean, exactly? And are you using mods in your game?
Are you putting fins or other aerodynamic control surface by the bottom of the rockets? Which version were you playing before the update?
